// used in end node
table_cam_add_entry l2_exact_table set_out_port 22:22:22:22:22:22 => 0b00000100
table_cam_add_entry ipv6_routing_table set_next_hop 0x00A10000000000000000000000000002 => 22:22:22:22:22:22
table_cam_add_entry srv6_transit_table insert_srv6_list_3 0x20010001000000000000000000000002 => 0 0 0x00A10000000000000000000000000002 0x00A10000000000000000000000000006 0x20010001000000000000000000000002
